name: api_input_LocationService
description: Provides methods that allow an application to access the device's location.

properties.name: isEnabledByUser
properties.description: Indicates whether the device allows the application to access the location service.

properties.name: lastData
properties.description: The last geographical location that the device registered.

properties.name: Stop
properties.description: Stops location service updates. This is useful to save battery power when the application doesn't re
